About ShalePumpkin - Rogue Champions

Developed by ShalePumpkin

Hi! I like board games and I like coding, so I put this together as fun little project. I hope you like it, and I hope someone else takes it and runs with it.

I really love Rogue-like games such as Slay the Spire, and board games with a continous state like Gloomhaven. This project was a great learning experience for VueJS and TypeScript, and was fun for me to make.

I didn't have the time to keep this fully updated with all the new cards and characters and expansions, so I'm hoping others can find something here that they like and maybe grow it to something they love.
